meals.name: Quinoa & Bean Bowl with BBQ Jerked Jackfruit
meals.description: A tasty bowl combining jerked jackfruit quinoa and red beans cooked in coconut milk. We use spices and herbs to create a Caribbean taste.

meals.name: Jackfruit Wraps
meals.description: These vegan burritos are filled with red beans, brown rice, cilantro, tomato, jackfruit seasoned with mexican spices with avocado spread.

meals.name: Lentil Spinach BurritoS
meals.description: These vegan burritos are filled with red beans, brown rice, cilantro, jerked jackfruit, and sauteed mixed veggies

meals.name: Jackfruit Stir Fry
meals.description: A little simple recipe to start off the weekend, Jackfruit Stir Fry. Everyone loves a good stir fry and even though its a pretty simple dish to make there are a few things you want to keep in mind before making one.

meals.name: Jackfruit Crab Cakes with Lemon Dill Sauce
meals.description: Our version of a classic seafood dish made with the versatile Jackfruit. These cakes come with Sauteed veggies and a cranberry cilantro quinoa salad

meals.name: Jambalaya
meals.description: A super nutritious recipe containing a great amount of plant protein, carbohydrates, this Louisiana classic will surely fill you up. Served with Cornbread and Southern Style Collard Greens

meals.name: Carolina Style Vegan 'Pulled BBQ' and Coleslaw
meals.description: For the barbecue lovers we have a Carolina Classic! Served with Chickpea Baked BBQ Beans & Roasted Sweet Potatoes

meals.name: The Holiday Dinner
meals.description: For a limited time only, the holiday dinner comes with jackfruit in the style of turkey with brown rice and gravy, cornbread dressing and squash casserole.

meals.name: Caribbean Curry Jackfruit
meals.description: Another Caribbean classic prepared with jackfruit instead of traditional meat. This is served with brown rice and beans & sauteed cabbage

meals.name: Quinoa & Lentil Stuffed Peppers
meals.description: Bell peppers packed full of a flavorful quinoa, lentil vegetable mixture! This recipe is gluten-free, full of fiber and protein and big on flavor! It's served with Sauteed Sweet Potatoes & Roasted Brussel Sprouts,

salads.name: Kale Apple Salad with Lemon Vinaigrette
Mixed Green Salad with Sesame-Ginger Vinaigrette
